name: OSArray
desc: A container for an ordered, random-access collection of objects.

items.name: + withArray
items.desc: Allocates an OSArray object with given members and preallocated capacity.

items.name: + withCapacity
items.desc: Allocates an OSArray object with preallocated capacity.

items.name: + withObjects
items.desc: Allocates an OSArray object with given members and preallocated capacity.

items.name: - merge
items.desc: Appends all members of an array to this array.

items.name: - flushCollection
items.desc: Removes and drops references to all members of array.

items.name: - getObject
items.desc: Returns a member of the array.

items.name: - getLastObject
items.desc: Returns the last member of the array.

items.name: - getNextIndexOfObject
items.desc: Searches the array for an object.

items.name: - setObject
items.desc: Appends an object as the last member of the array.

items.name: - setObject
items.desc: Sets an object as the member of the array at a given index.

items.name: - iterateObjects
items.desc: Iterates the array calling a callback block for each member.

items.name: - replaceObject
items.desc: Removes a current member of the array and replaces it with another object.

items.name: - removeObject
items.desc: Removes a current member of the array.

items.name: - getCount
items.desc: Returns count of members in array.

items.name: - getCapacity
items.desc: Returns count of currently allocated capacity for members in array.

items.name: - ensureCapacity
items.desc: Allocates capacity for members in array.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares all members of two arrays with isEqualTo().

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the array with an OSObject
